byline.original: By HERBERT L. MATTHEWS Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES

abstract: Pope hopes for restoration of France, lr to French Bishops; assailed by R Farinacci
snippet: ROME, Aug. 2--Sentiments not only of paternal affection but of a desire to see France resurrected in her entirety were expressed by Pope Pius in a letter addressed to French Bishops a few days ago....

headline.main: Pope Hopes to See France Reborn, He Declares in Letter to Bishops; Pontiff Deplores "Unprecedented Disaster Which Crossed Your Fatherland"--Fascist Ex-Secretary Attacks the Message

lead_paragraph: ROME, Aug. 2--Sentiments not only of paternal affection but of a desire to see France resurrected in her entirety were expressed by Pope Pius in a letter addressed to French Bishops a few days ago.
